basics.name: Jeano Ermitaño
basics.summary: Accomplished IT professional with over 5 years of managerial experience, transitioning to cybersecurity with certifications in Cisco, ISC2,  and EC-Council Ethical Hacking Essentials, ready to leverage my leadership and technical skills to strengthen organizational security.

work.name: STI College Las Piñas
work.summary: Managing the degree programs BSIT, BSCS, BSCpE, and BMMA, including faculty development plans, evaluation, student pre-assessment, faculty loading, etc. Also teaching college-level courses including software engineering, programming, interface design, cybersecurity, and automata theory.

work.name: Personiv
work.summary: Designing beautiful, responsive websites using the latest technologies to transform a copy into a fully-functioning website in less than 3 days.
